meanings.definition: Engaging in noisy and boisterous merrymaking.
meanings.sent1: The roistering group of friends laughed loudly at the party.
meanings.sent2: The street was filled with roistering people celebrating the festival.
meanings.sent3: The roistering guests at the wedding danced energetically all night.
meanings.sent4: The roistering crowd in the stadium cheered with unrestrained joy.
meanings.sent5: The roistering music from the concert echoed through the city streets.

meanings.definition: To revel noisily and without restraint.
meanings.sent1: They were roistering in the park, making a lot of noise.
meanings.sent2: The group roistered in the bar until late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The children roistered around the playground, having a great time.
meanings.sent4: The fans roistered in excitement as their team scored a goal.
meanings.sent5: The revelers roistered on the dance floor, enjoying the music.
